scripts.dev: npm run dev -w @jira-lite/api & npm run dev -w @jira-lite/web
scripts.typecheck: node scripts/run-parallel.mjs "npm run typecheck -w @jira-lite/api" "npm run typecheck -w @jira-lite/web"
scripts.build:apps: node scripts/run-parallel.mjs "npm run build -w @jira-lite/api" "npm run build -w @jira-lite/web"
scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate -w @jira-lite/api && npm run build:apps
scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run test:e2e:api
